channel.title: Re-Balance
channel.description:
[font=andale mono]Welcome to my project thread. Many of you may be wondering what Re-Balance is well Re-Balance is an attempt the Bring and Economy To the three most used bases (In my opionon) and also balance the combat triangle.[/font]
[font=impact]Im going to be using a Delta Base, A Project Insanity Base, And a Project Czar base to start out with below i will list some key goals for each base[/font]
[font=verdana]Delta
Deleting All Customs Creating an economy using only the items in the rs 317 cache balancing the combat triangle[/font]
[font=trebuchet ms]Czar
Removing all useless commands and spam text deleting all customs creating an economy using only the items in the rs 317 cache start to balance to combat triangle[/font]
Update Log [code]2/19 Started to remove all usesless commands and text Removed all Shops, Npcs, And items from the .cfg files Started to add basic wieldable items with real runescape stats -------------------------------------------------------------------------[/code]
[font=comic sans ms]Project Instanity Deleting All Customs Creating an economy using only the items in the rs 317 cache balancing the combat triangle[/font]
posting some media soon

item.title: Re-Balance
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:9, topic:383087”][quote author=Kaex link=topic=478868.msg3506387#msg3506387 date=1298178337]

Use some Grammar in the development thread, and good luck with the development as well.

Sorry ive picked up really bad grammer habits over the years.

[quote]Not trying to troll or anything, but i think pi clients use 377, and i correct me if im wrong, but i think no one was a complete cache of anything under 377? So i guess anything in 377 cache

But i think, im not sure, correct me if im wrong, but anyways good luck on this, i really like how you want to use only the original items, no customs, and balance the combat triangle

Good Luck![/quote]

Thanks and if it is 377 i guess thats what i meant

Most 317 clients use 377 cache these days, but I can confirm, 317 cache still exists. I have a non-corrupt complete client with 317 cache. And the cool-ass fally.
[/quote]
a FULL 317 cache, if so, you are one lucky guy.[/quote]

That sir, I am lol.

Read full topic
